renewable energy.title: Green Flexibility breaks ground on 80 MWh battery in Germany
renewable energy.snippet: Green Flexibility has broken ground on an 80 MWh battery energy storage system (BESS) project in Germany.

solar power.title: Wind and solar power fuel over one-third of Brazil's electricity for first time
solar power.snippet: Wind and solar power generated more than a third of Brazil's electricity in August, marking the first time these renewable sources have crossed that threshold.

solar power.title: solar power - latest news, breaking stories and comment
solar power.snippet: Latest guides, news and information on solar power, including breakthroughs in renewable energy, space solar panels, and solar panel installation reviews.

solar power.title: In case you missed it: Six big solar stories in the news this week
solar power.snippet: News from the past week including market trends, project updates, policy changes and more.

wind energy.title: States look to unleash wind and solar boom while tax credits still exist
wind energy.snippet: Colorado, Maine, and other states are prioritizing clean energy deployment as Trump's budget law threatens to raise electricity costs and delay climate goals.

hydropower.title: Energy Department Celebrates National Hydropower Day, Advancing American Energy Dominance
hydropower.snippet: In celebration of National Hydropower Day, DOE announced several actions that will help unleash American hydropower.

hydropower.title: Bhutan's PM hails Wangchhu Hydropower Project agreement with Adani Power
hydropower.snippet: Bhutan's Prime Minister Tshering Tobgay hailed the Wangchhu Hydropower Project agreement with Adani Power Ltd. as a historic step in Bhutan-

geothermal energy.title: Orkuveitan starts preparatory work for exploration geothermal drilling in Ölfus, Iceland
geothermal energy.snippet: Orkuveitan, an Icelandic energy company, has begun preparatory work for exploration geothermal drilling in Ölfus.

geothermal energy.title: California set for 500MW geothermal project to power AI
geothermal energy.snippet: Controlled Thermal Resources (CTR) and Baker Hughes will develop a 500MW geothermal project in California to power AI infrastructure.

energy company.title: Latest news and insights on the global energy industry
energy company.snippet: Activist Investor Reveals Bargain in Japan's Utility Shares. Nuclear, Gas Win EU Court Boost in Blow to Green Groups. Berlin Power Outage Hits 50,000 After Suspected Arson Attack. Rio Tinto to Buy Carbon Credits from New Australian Platform. Edison CEO Says Ready to Relist If Parent EDF Decides in Favor. Buffett's Oregon Utility Says Fire Lawsuits Pose Shutdown Risk.

energy company.title: Energy and Power Generation News | Utility Dive
energy company.snippet: Entergy expects data centers to drive 13% near-term annual sales growth: CEO. With new gas-fired generation expected, Entergy faces challenges in meeting its 50% carbon reduction goal for 2030, CEO Drew Marsh said. ... Conduit Power to supply 'bridge power' for Texas data centers at ENGIE battery sites. Prometheus Hyperscale and Conduit expect the first site to come online in 2026. On-site gas generators and batteries will provide initial power as Prometheus awaits a grid connection.

energy company.title: ET EnergyWorld: Energy News | Latest Energy Industry Information and Updates
energy company.snippet: ONGC to rope in BP's experts to help develop KG fields. Vedanta outbids Adani Group to acquire JAL with ₹17,000 crore offer. Shell Energy India wins green nod to raise capacity of Hazira LNG terminal to 26.2 mt costing ₹21,600 crores. Altmin's lithium project becomes first to join Mineral Security Partnership from India. US presses G7 to hit India, China with steep tariffs over Russian oil purchases.

oil and gas company.title: Strathcona Files Amended Offer to Acquire MEG Energy
oil and gas company.snippet: Strathcona's amended offer reflects a 10 percent increase to its original offer and equates to an 11 percent premium to the Cenovus-MEG agreement, the company said.

utility company.title: Entergy expects data centers to drive 13% near-term annual sales growth: CEO
utility company.snippet: With new gas-fired generation expected, Entergy faces challenges in meeting its 50% carbon reduction goal for 2030, CEO Drew Marsh said.

renewable energy developer.title: U.S. solar projects face development crunch while Canada says “Build, baby, build”
renewable energy developer.snippet: Solar developers prioritize advanced-stage projects in the U.S. due to tightened tax credit deadlines, while projects in Canada are “full speed forward.”

energy infrastructure company.title: $4 billion oil & gas assignment in Middle East breaks Chinese companies' record
energy infrastructure company.snippet: Qatar's state-owned oil & gas giant QatarEnergy has entrusted China's Offshore Oil Engineering Company (COOEC) with two segments of work related to its redevelopment project off the Persian Gulf state's coast. This package, worth approximately $4 billion, is said to set a new contract value record for Chinese enterprises in the Middle East region's offshore oil and gas realm.

carbon credits.title: Rio Tinto to Buy Carbon Credits from New Australian Platform
carbon credits.snippet: Rio Tinto Group will be a major buyer of carbon credits from a new Australian platform, Meldora, which aims to generate credits through sustainable agriculture and carbon capture.

carbon tax.title: U.S. threatens tariffs to block global shipping carbon tax | NEWS - Reccessary
carbon tax.snippet: The United States is pushing back against a global carbon pricing plan for the shipping sector, threatening retaliatory measures—including tariffs, port levies, and visa restrictions—against countries that support it.

energy policy.title: More than 350,000 European companies to get energy efficiency support under major EU financing initiative
energy policy.snippet: More than 350,000 European companies are set to make energy efficiency gains through a €17.5 billion financing initiative by the European Union.  The initiative aims to mobilise total investment of over €65 billion by 2027 for energy savings by SMEs, helping to close a market gap in Europe.

emissions trading.title: Examining the Interactions of Carbon, Electricity, and Natural Gas Markets
emissions trading.snippet: Research on the price transmission origin, paths, and multiscale response mechanisms among carbon, natural gas, and electricity markets, especially the impact of the Russia-Ukraine conflict on their interaction, remains insufficient.

renewable energy standards.title: US energy panel approves rule to expand transmission of renewable power | AP News
renewable energy standards.snippet: Federal energy regulators on Monday approved a long-awaited rule to make it easier to transmit renewable energy such as wind and solar power to the electric grid — a key part of President Joe Biden's goal to eliminate carbon emissions economy-wide by 2050.
